title: Trendbezzlement 3/25: Ketanji Brown Jackson, Bridgerton, JK Rowling, Ginni Thomas, Hayden Panettiere, Oscars
itunes:title: Trendbezzlement 3/25: Ketanji Brown Jackson, Bridgerton, JK Rowling, Ginni Thomas, Hayden Panettiere, Oscars
description:
In this edition of Trendbezzlement, Jack and Miles discuss Joe Manchin saying he will vote to confirm Ketanji Brown Jackson, Bridgerton S2 dropping, Russia being cancelled like JK Rowling, Ginni Thomas being Q, Hayden Panettiere's bar room brawl, and the never-ending desperation and hypocrisy of the Academy Awards.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
